sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <el-divider content-position="left">{{$t('i18nView.toDoTaskPool')}}</el-divider>

    <cus-filter-wraper>
      <el-form :inline="true">
        <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdCode')" prop="">
          <el-input v-model="params1.pdCode" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.pdEdition')" prop="">
          <el-input v-model="params1.pdEdition" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.taskName')" prop="">
          <el-input v-model="params1.taskName" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-button class="filter-button" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch">{{$t('i18nView.query')}}</el-button>
      </el-form>
    </cus-filter-wraper>
    <el-table :data="configs1" align="center" border class="wraper-table" element-loading-text="Loading" fit
              highlight-current-row
              size="mini">>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" type="index"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.insuranceCode')" prop="pdCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.editionNum')" prop="pdEdition"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.taskName')" prop="taskName"></el-table-column>
      <!--      <el-table-column label="任务ID" align="center" prop="taskId" sortable></el-table-column>-->
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button class="filter-button" icon="el-icon-edit" size="mini" type="primary"
                     @click="claimTask(scope.row.taskId)">{{$t('i18nView.clamin')}}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <!-- 分页 -->
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="configs1" :pageSize="10" :params="params1"
                    url="/workflow/tasklist/queryUnAssignTask"/>


    <el-divider content-position="left">{{$t('i18nView.taskPoolPersonal')}}</el-divider>

    <el-form :inline="true">
      <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdCode')" prop="">
        <el-input v-model="params2.pdCode" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.pdEdition')" prop="">
        <el-input v-model="params2.pdEdition" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.taskName')" prop="">
        <el-input v-model="params2.taskName" clearable placeholder=""></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-button class="filter-button" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch2">{{$t('i18nView.query')}}</el-button>
    </el-form>
    <el-table :data="configs2" align="center" border class="wraper-table" element-loading-text="Loading" fit
              highlight-current-row
              size="mini">>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" type="index"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.insuranceCode')" prop="pdCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.editionNum')" prop="pdEdition"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filterHandler" :filters="[{text: '产品框架定义', value: '产品框架定义'},
                          {text: '产品营运定义', value: '产品营运定义'},
                          {text: '新单测试', value: '新单测试'},
                          {text: '续期续保测试', value: '续期续保测试'},
                          {text: '保全测试', value: '保全测试'},
                          {text: '理赔测试', value: '理赔测试'},
                           {text: '产品审核', value: '产品审核'},
                           {text: '产品发布', value: '产品发布'}]" align="center"
                       column-key="taskName"
                       :label="$t('i18nView.taskName')"
                       prop="taskName"

      ></el-table-column>
      <!--      <el-table-column label="任务ID" align="center" prop="taskId" sortable></el-table-column>-->
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button class="filter-button" icon="el-icon-edit" size="mini" type="primary">{{$t('i18nView.transcation')}}</el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <!-- 分页 -->
    <cus-pagination ref="page2" v-model="configs2" :pageSize="10" :params="params2"
                    url="/workflow/tasklist/queryOwnTask"/>
  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>

import {claimTask} from '@/api/workflow/workflow'

export default {
  name: 'workflow-task',
  data() {
    return {
      filterHandler(value, row, column) {
        const property = column['property']
        return row[property] === value
      },
      configs1: [],
      configs2: [],
      params1: {
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        taskName: ''
      }, params2: {
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        taskName: ''
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
  },
  mounted() {
  },
  methods: {
    handleSearch() {
      this.$refs.page.reload()
    }, handleSearch2() {
      this.$refs.page2.reload()
    },
    claimTask(taskId) {
      this.confirmWarning('确定要认领当前任务吗？').then(() => {
        let data = {'taskId': taskId}
        claimTask(data).then(response => {
          this.handleSearch()
          this.handleSearch2()
          this.notifySuccess(response.message)
        })
      }).catch(() => {

      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
